name: Banaag Diwa - Atenews
description: Banaag Diwa, the official literary folio of Atenews, calls on the growing literary and photography community of Ateneo de Davao University to examine, capture, and reveal the concentric factors that have plagued our humanity since and have now enabled the tragedy of this pandemic. Writers and photographers are invited to take part this year’s Banaag Diwa: Pandemya.
